name: The Way of Cinnamon
description:
Join Cinnamon on this 3D platforming adventure, and rescue his captive Red Panda family from the evil Wu-Long and his band of Snow Leopards!

  • Create your own platforms and attack enemies using your trusty shied, Dun!
  • Explore unique environments and collect a variety of items!
  • Free your captive Red Panda friends!
  • Explore the Gallery mode for an in-depth look inside the game!
  • Controllers are both supported and recommended.
